intro.description: The next steps show you how to add an AUT to your Project.

item.title: Defining the AUT
item.description:
Select:
Test > Properties
Select AUT's from the list on the left and click Add.
Enter Adder as the AUT name.
Choose Swing or JavaFX as the toolkit, depending on which AUT you want to start (they are both functionally the same).
Click OK and then OK again.
